text: Arthur Stanley Newens (4 February 1930 – 2 March 2021) was a British Labour Co-operative politician. He was a Member of Parliament (MP) from 1964 to 1970 and 1974 to 1983. He was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from 1984 to 1999. Newens was born in London. Newens died on 2 March 2021 in London, aged 91.The Guardian: Stan Newens obituary ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:UK MPs 1964–1966 Category:UK MPs 1966–1970 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:MEPs for the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from London
title: Stan Newens
